items.sentence: Tom is going to Mary's house this afternoon.
Tom is going back to Boston on October 20th.
Tom is best friends with my younger brother.
Tom is banging the skillet with a big spoon.
Tom is a lot more confrontational than Mary.
Tom hired a detective to follow Mary around.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all very busy.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all laughed at me.
Tom wouldn't tell me what needed to be done.
Tom wondered why Mary wasn't wearing gloves.
Tom won't tell Mary why he wants to do that.
Tom wished he knew why Mary didn't like him.
Tom will probably be able to fix Mary's car.
Tom will likely be happy to do that for you.
Tom will let you know what we need to bring.
Tom will be coming back to Boston next week.
Tom went back to school to get his umbrella.
Tom was asleep when Mary came over to visit.
Tom was already doing that when I got there.
Tom turned around to see who was behind him.
